definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: The control of supercritical airfoil boundary layer separation is adapted using micro-vortex generators.
sentences.chinese: 超臨界翼型附面層分離控制適合採用微型渦流發生器。

sentences.english: The supercritical water oxidation(SCWO) is a kind of promising waste water treatment method.
sentences.chinese: 超臨界水氧化法是一種很有前途的廢水處理方法。

sentences.english: Supercritical CO2 fluid was used to extract the flavone in Artemisia Selengensis Turcz.
sentences.chinese: 採用超臨界CO2萃取藜蒿中黃酮類物質。

sentences.english: The supercritical water oxidation (SCWO) is a promising process of wastewater treatment.
sentences.chinese: 超臨界水氧化是一種很有前途的廢水處理方法。

sentences.english: Babcock design, supply and construct advanced boiler technology including super critical for the utility power industry.
sentences.chinese: 斗山巴布源設，供貨建設括超臨界技先鍋爐技。

sentences.english: Wet biomass can be efficiently gasified in supercritical water to produce a hydrogen rich fuel gas.
sentences.chinese: 溼生物質可以在超臨界水中有效地氣化生成富氫氣體。

sentences.english: Ultra-supercritical boiler has great advantage in saving energy and protecting environment.
sentences.chinese: 超超臨界機組在節能和環保方面有很大的優勢。

sentences.english: The phase behavior of the hydroformylation of propylene in supercritical CO_2 was simulated.
sentences.chinese: 模擬了超臨界丙烯氫甲酰反應體系的相行爲。

sentences.english: The results enunciate that in supercritical water the residual oil can easily be upgraded.
sentences.chinese: 表明在超臨界水中減壓渣油實現了較好的輕質化改質。

sentences.english: To study the effect of lycopene by supercritical CO2 extraction on anti-aging.
sentences.chinese: 研究應用超臨界CO2提取的番茄紅素對衰老的作用。

sentences.english: In this paper, the progress on the techniques of micronizing drug particles with supercritical fluids was revie…
sentences.chinese: 本文對超臨界流體藥物微粒化技術的研究進行了綜述。

sentences.english: This experiment studied the supercritical CO2 fluid extraction(SFE-CO2) technology of Carya kernel oil(CKO).
sentences.chinese: 對超臨界CO2萃取山核桃油的工藝條件進行了實驗。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the overspeed protection system of supercritical steam turbines are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 重點分析超臨界汽輪機的超速保護系統的特點。

sentences.english: The gingerols from ginger were extracted with supercritical CO2 fluid extraction.
sentences.chinese: 以生薑爲原料，採用超臨界CO2萃取姜酚類化合物。

sentences.english: The progress on supercritical fluid chromatography (SFC) using in preparative chiral pharmaceuticals is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了超臨界流體色譜應用於手性藥物的進展。

sentences.english: The extraction of eucommia seed oil was studied using eucommia seeds as raw material and supercritical CO2 as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 以杜仲籽爲原料，超臨界CO2爲溶劑萃取杜仲籽油。
